heading: Today
text: Snow tapering to snow showers. Some breaks of afternoon sun from the Eastern Townships into parts of NH. Additional amounts of a dusting to 2 inches. Highs in the upper 20s to mid 30s. East winds 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy, with a chance of snow showers west and south of I-89. Partly cloudy northeast. Lows in the teens, except 5 to 10 north and east of I-89. Winds light and variable.

heading: Sunday
text: Variable clouds and sun north and east of I-89. More clouds and a few snow showers south and west. Highs in the upper 20s to low 30s. Winds light and variable.
